thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Largo Announces Agreement To Qualify, Produce And Sell Vanadium Powder

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Largo Announces Agreement To Qualify, Produce And Sell Vanadium Powder
text:
March 5 (Reuters) - Largo Resources Ltd:
* LARGO ANNOUNCES AGREEMENT TO QUALIFY, PRODUCE AND SELL VANADIUM POWDER & PROVIDES OPERATIONAL AND VANADIUM MARKET UPDATE
* LARGO RESOURCES LTD - WILL BEGIN PRODUCTION OF V2O5 POWDER TO SUPPLEMENT ITS CURRENT VANADIUM PENTOXIDE FUSED FLAKE PRODUCTION DURING Q1 2018
* LARGO RESOURCES LTD - ‍ INTENDS TO QUALIFY, PRODUCE AND SELL VANADIUM PENTOXIDE POWDER VIA GLENCORE INTERNATIONAL AG​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
